p.01703376c4a81c0e9d91: Set the application theme or the theme of a given brick
p.01703376c4a81c0e9d92:
Setting a theme will change the appearance of the UI components that are in or under the brick where the theme as been set.

If the theme is set at the Application level (no value given in the `Scoped Brick Tag` property), every UI components will be affected.

If the them is set at a brick level, using the `Scoped Brick Tag` property, only the UI components in or under this brick will be affected.

If a Brick has a theme, this brick theme overrides the Application theme or any theme from Bricks above itself.
Optional: if provided, the theme will only be applied from the context of this brick and downward. Otherwise, the theme will be applied at the application level.
Optoinal: if true, the action will be triggered only once a value has been provided to the theme property.
